availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Watkins (Kentucky soldier, murdered Confederate guerilla James Keller)

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private from August 14, 1862 to September 11, 1863. Mustered out September 11, 1863. Murdered Confederate guerilla James B. Keller in Caldwell County, Kentucky in October 1863.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 238.
"Major Wileman's Murderers Captured,"Louisville Journal(Louisville, KY), October 20, 1863, p.1.
